# GitHub Actions Status Badges

Copy and paste these badges into your README.md to show workflow status:

## All Workflows

```markdown
![CI](https://github.com/Chaitra-Yogananda/Certificate-Download-BE-HR-Portal/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)
![Code Quality](https://github.com/Chaitra-Yogananda/Certificate-Download-BE-HR-Portal/actions/workflows/code-quality.yml/badge.svg)
![CodeQL](https://github.com/Chaitra-Yogananda/Certificate-Download-BE-HR-Portal/actions/workflows/codeql.yml/badge.svg)
```

## With Branch Filtering

Show status for specific branch:

```markdown
![CI](https://github.com/Chaitra-Yogananda/Certificate-Download-BE-HR-Portal/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg?branch=main)
```

## Combined Status Table

Create a nice status table:

```markdown
| Workflow | Status |
|----------|--------|
| CI Build | ![CI](https://github.com/Chaitra-Yogananda/Certificate-Download-BE-HR-Portal/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg) |
| Code Quality | ![Code Quality](https://github.com/Chaitra-Yogananda/Certificate-Download-BE-HR-Portal/actions/workflows/code-quality.yml/badge.svg) |
| CodeQL | ![CodeQL](https://github.com/Chaitra-Yogananda/Certificate-Download-BE-HR-Portal/actions/workflows/codeql.yml/badge.svg) |
| Deploy | ![Deploy](https://github.com/Chaitra-Yogananda/Certificate-Download-BE-HR-Portal/actions/workflows/cd.yml/badge.svg) |
```

## Links with Badges

Make badges clickable:

```markdown
[![CI](https://github.com/Chaitra-Yogananda/Certificate-Download-BE-HR-Portal/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Chaitra-Yogananda/Certificate-Download-BE-HR-Portal/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
```
